description: This file defines a Flutter widget for displaying a list of rooms, including loading data via a service, handling errors, and UI rendering.

classes.name: RoomsListScreen
classes.description: A Flutter StatefulWidget that shows a list of available rooms, with refresh and error handling.

classes.name: _RoomsListScreenState
classes.description: State class for RoomsListScreen managing the UI state and data loading.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes the state and triggers loading of room data.

methods.name: _loadRooms
methods.description: Asynchronously fetches room data from RoomsService and updates UI state, with error handling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the rooms list screen with conditional UI states.
